metadata.title: Team Updates System Specification
metadata.purpose: Generate human-readable summaries of all codebase changes for team synchronization

business_value.goal: Reduce communication overhead and onboarding time by 30-50%
business_value.value_impact: Faster feature delivery, reduced context switching, improved team velocity
business_value.revenue_impact: Indirect - reduces developer churn, accelerates time-to-market

metadata.author: Elite Engineer

requirement.description: MUST be readable by junior team members with less than 1 year experience
MUST support multiple time frames: last hour, 5 hours, 24 hours, week, month
MUST aggregate data from: git commits, test reports, compliance, docs, architecture
MUST prioritize critical issues and breaking changes at the top

module.name: team_updates_orchestrator
module.responsibility: Main coordinator for generating team updates

functions.function: Generate complete team update for time frame
Convert time frame to datetime range

module.name: git_changes_analyzer
module.responsibility: Analyze git commits and generate summaries

module.name: test_report_analyzer
module.responsibility: Analyze test reports and identify issues
